quotes.quote: One has a greater sense of intellectual degradation after an interview with a doctor than from any human experience.
quotes.author: Alice James

quotes.quote: Let's not kid ourselves. Whatever we diagnose, most patients, if they don't die, get well by themselves. Our job is mainly to try to make them feel better; do no harm.
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: Half of the modern drugs could well be thrown out of the window, except that the birds might eat them.
quotes.author: Dr. Martin Henry Fischer

quotes.quote: Don't live in a town where there are no doctors.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: [Medicine is] a collection of uncertain prescriptions the results of which, taken collectively, are more fatal than useful to mankind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Orthodox medicine has not found an answer to your complaint. However, luckily for you, I happen to be a quack.
quotes.author: Richter cartoon caption

quotes.quote: One of the first duties of the physician is to educate the masses not to take medicine.
quotes.author: Sir William Osler

quotes.quote: The desire to take medicine is perhaps the greatest feature which distinguishes man from animals.
quotes.author: Sir William Osler

quotes.quote: Formerly, when religion was strong and science weak, men mistook magic for medicine; now, when science is strong and religion weak, men mistake medicine for magic.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
quotes.author: Voltaire
